mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of William W. Beverley as a student. Pose 1 is from 1909 and shows him wearing a suit. Pose 2 is from 1910 and shows him dressed for Commencement. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of William W. Beverley (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
Washington and Lee University
Students
